Summary: Points of light manuevering in parabolic patterns at high rate of speed
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Burbank
There were 2 other sightings in Burbank on or around February 13th 2007
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsmy vantage point was from outside my office in woodland hills, ca. i noticed a large (747) fedex jet flying over my office and i thought it was strange for such a large jet to be headed towards burbank airport, as this airfield is generally for smaller commercial aircraft. as i watched to see if the plane would turn into the landing pattern for burbank airport, i noticed a bright point of light in the cloud directly behind the fedex jet. at first i only saw one object then i noticed there were at least 2 others. the lights i saw were an amber color. almost as if the object was reflecting the setting sun to the west. i believe i saw 3 distinct objects. but they were only visible as a group for a short period of time. each point of light would vary in intensity. from very bright (they seemed to expand as the light got brighter), to barely visible. the lights had to be quite bright because the objects were clearly visible while being either in the cloud or behind it. and the cloud itself was rather dark. now, these lights were moving in some rather strange patterns. i would describe the flight patterns as parabolic. they would move in one direction and perform what i would describe as a 'u-turn' and move back in the other direction. these 'u-turns' were executed at a high rate of speed. at one point i saw multiple lights performing these manuevers. it resembled two squirreles chasing each other around and up a tree. at one point one of the lights was performing the parabaolic maneuver (on an off axis) and it stopped in its tracks. it hovered in that position for roughly 10 seconds. then without a noticeable acceleration period, continued the maneuver at the same high rate of speed. all of the movement i witnessed was at a relatively high rate of speed. i would estimate the altitude to be about 10-15,000 feet and the distance from myself to the objects at about 20 miles. i have never seen an object in the air travel this fast or manuever like these objects did. at no time were these objects visible outside the the cloud that was moving past. the whole episode lasted 8-10 minutes. at which point the cloud had changed its shape and had moved off into the distance and the objects were no longer appearing. i have always been on the fence about the ufo phenomenon. i always believed that people were seeing something, but what they are seeing as of today has not been explained. what i saw today seems to be textbook from what i have heard others have seen - objects moving in a manner that cannot be explained by conventional physics summary - bright points of light in the sky executing manuevers that conventional aircraft (at least any aircraft i am aware of) could not. executing these manuevers at a high rate of speed and stopping\starting on a dime. i am quick to point out that i am not claiming i saw et. the truth is, i have no friggin clue what these objects were. all i know is what i saw. i do not drink or use drugs, so i am pretty sure i was not hallucinating. and the fact that i witnessed this over a considerable period of time as apposed to a split second out of the corner of my eye, makes me think i wasn't seeing things that were not there. i am curious if any others in the san fernanado valley area saw what i saw. i do know that unless the viewer happened to be looking in that exact area of the sky, they would not have noticed it. i was walking to my car form work so i did not have a camera or video camera on my person. all i have is my eyewitness account. please respond if any other reports of this sighting are filed.
